saveResponseToFile(String, String) - Static method in class com.company.FileUtils
Saves the response file into a file (specified with the given format ) and if the format is not given , it is saved into a html file , in responses directory .
send() - Method in class com.company.RequestHandler
Makes a new connection , opens it and sends the request .
sendPatch(String, String) - Method in class com.company.RequestHandler
Sends patch method , it is implemented in a different method because the library used for this method is different .
SendRequest - Class in com.company
Extends swing worker class and Controls sending a request with using RequestHandler to generate and send a specific request with while using GUI interface .

serializeRequest(URL, String, String, ArrayList<ArrayList<String>>, boolean) - Static method in class com.company.FileUtils
For saving a request we need to serialize it and afterwards deserialize is needed to read it and show it in "jurl list" .
SerializeSettings - Class in com.company
This class serializes the Settings class and writes it into a file every time the program runs to read it later .
